threshold_tuning.observation: T_Technological dominance: 13/20 = 65%. WF2 structural characteristic — arXiv cs.* categories naturally dominate. 5-run average: 61%. Within acceptable range. P_Political: 0/20 — arXiv rarely publishes on political topics directly. E_Environmental strong at 2/20 (physics.ao-ph, q-bio.PE).
threshold_tuning.recommendation: No threshold change. arXiv category distribution is structurally tech-heavy. Expected.

agent_performance.observation: WF2 Phase 3 initially failed validation with SEC-001 (duplicate section 7, missing section 8). This is the SECOND occurrence of this pattern (also seen in prior sessions). Root cause: report generator not consistently including section 8 (부록).
agent_performance.recommendation: MINOR: Add explicit 8-section check to report generator prompt for WF2. The validation script correctly caught this — L2 defense working as designed.
agent_performance.note: Validation retry succeeded after manual fix. 17/17 PASS on second attempt.

classification_quality.observation: 5 early academic signals identified today that are NOT yet in mainstream media. This is WF2's core value proposition. Lead time estimated: 2-3 years for ASPEN brain decoding; 6-12 months for AI agent policy compiler. Cross-WF correlation with WF1 signal 10 (marine plankton) confirmed by WF2 Southern Ocean paper.
classification_quality.recommendation: Maintain current academic-to-mainstream lead time tracking. Consider adding lead_time_estimate field to classified-signals JSON.

workflow_efficiency.observation: 724 papers scanned (48h window). Phase 1→2→3 transitions clean. Gate checks passed. arXiv scanner performance nominal.

hallucination_tracking.observation: All arXiv papers cited with cs.*, quant-ph, econ.*, q-fin.*, eess.*, cond-mat.*, physics.ao-ph, q-bio.* category tags. Signal IDs follow wf2-{YYYYMMDD}-{NNN} format. 0 ID corruption events.

source_exploration.observation: WF2 uses arXiv exclusively by design. Source exploration is not applicable.

source_health.observation: arXiv API responded normally. No rate limiting or access failures in 48h window scan.

minor_proposals.description: Add explicit reminder in WF2 report generation prompt: 'Section 8 (부록) is REQUIRED — include scan parameters table, source registry, and SIE memo.' This prevents recurrence of the Section 8 omission pattern detected in 2 of last 5 runs.
minor_proposals.evidence: Section 8 omission: 2/5 recent runs (40% recurrence rate). Caught by L2 validation both times.

minor_proposals.description: Add 'lead_time_estimate' field to classified-signals schema for WF2. Estimated lead time from academic publication to mainstream media coverage. Values: 0-6m, 6-12m, 1-2y, 2-3y, 3y+.
minor_proposals.evidence: Early academic signal identification is WF2's key differentiator. Structured lead time data would enable timeline analysis and cross-WF comparison.

summary: WF2 SIE 2026-02-19: 7개 분석 영역 완료. 자동 적용 변경 0건. 마이너 제안 2건 (섹션 8 누락 방지 프롬프트 강화, lead_time_estimate 필드 추가). 724편 논문에서 5개 조기 학술 신호 탐지 — WF2 핵심 기능 정상 작동.
